## HTTPErrorX.create() method

Creates an HTTPErrorX from a status code preset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create(statusCode?: HTTPErrorXPresetKey, overrides?: Partial<ErrorXOptions<HTTPErrorXMetadata>>): HTTPErrorX;
```
